body_content.explanation: the fact of having a pleasant sweet taste or containing a lot of juice:
examples: Strawberries picked before they are ripe will never quite achieve full lusciousness.
Cottage cheese lends a creamy lusciousness to baked pasta recipes.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being very sexually attractive:
examples: She is unaware of her own lusciousness.
Her beauty has a lipglossed lusciousness.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being very attractive and pleasing to hear, look at, read, feel, etc.:
examples: He admired the lusciousness of the flowers and the brilliance of the crystal.
The film’s pictorial lusciousness can't really compensate for the plot's lack of excitement.
